Title: YPO - 000654 Crematorium Equipment
Description: YPO are looking for primary service providers to be appointed onto a Framework Agreement that are able to provide design, supply, installation and commissioning of cremators and abatement equipment including but not limited to refurbishment or refit works, minor works, ongoing maintenance, removal and disposal of existing equipment and ancillary products/services. This Framework Agreement is for an initial period of 2 years with two options to extend for a further 12 months (2 + 1 + 1).
Additional Text:
Instructions to Suppliers: To see the documentation, please go online to 
https://tendering.ypo.co.uk/procontract/ypo/supplier.nsf/frm_supplier_registrati
on_wizard_introduction?openform and 'Register as a Supplier'.

1.    Click on the appropriate tender under 'Latest Opportunities'
2.    Click the “Register Interest” button which is located under the “Main 
Contract Detail”
3.    Click on 'ok'
4.    Return back to the home page and select the “My Opportunities” link, 
located on the right hand side of your home page.
5.    Select the link to the tender
6.    Select “view stage detail” and download the documents. For ‘online 
question’ tenders, use the response wizard to start answering questions online.

Title: Servicing of Cremators at West Road Crematorium
Description: The authority require a single provider for the service and maintenance of equipment at the West Road Crematorium in Newcastle upon Tyne.  The contract is for an initial period of 36 months, with the option to extend for 3 x 12 months.
